item.title: Golang basics & Handling 100k hourly webhooks with golang @MimePost
item.description: What this talk about? I am working on Golang for the last 1 year from the published date. I have shared some basics of Golang. Also, shared What are the pain points developers face when they migrate from any other language (Especially from web language like PHP) to Golang? I have explained the Webhook architecture of MimePost And how we sending 100k Request hourly( Though Benchmark proves we can scale up to 500k).
